main event: On January 28, 1959, an intensely bright, pulsating object was observed approximately 1000 miles WSW of the Azores Islands.
interesting points: The object changed colors from bright white to deep red, then to green and white while stationary., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object was evaluated as unidentified with no definitive conclusions reached regarding its nature., Reports from people in North Carolina, Alabama, and Georgia described seeing and hearing unidentified objects, some with an odor of scorched grass., A witness named Mrs. Pearl Salter reported that an object burned her hands when she attempted to pick it up.
location: Approx 1000 MI WSW of Azores Is, Azores, Portugal
witness description: Witnesses included locals in the area who reported seeing various unidentified objects.
